import pandas as pd

from pandas_profiling import ProfileReport

df_order_book.loc[:,'BidQuoteQty']= df_order_book.loc[:,'bidPrice'] * df_order_book.loc[:,'bidQty']

source.4998cca0:
#Generate report
#If the database has many records or columns, the report can take a long time
#If this is the case, disable the explorative, samples, correlations, missing_diagrams, duplicates and interactions options by commenting out
profile = ProfileReport(df_order_book, title=f"Pandas Profiling Report for df_order_book"
                        ,explorative=True
                        #,samples=None
                        #,correlations=None
                        #,missing_diagrams=None
                        #,duplicates=None
                        #,interactions=None
                       )
profile.to_file("profile.html")
display(profile)
